This page keeps track of the current release status of the Mobile Team.

=== Summary ===

* openoffice "uno" fix uploaded (Bug:417009)
* webservice office bug fixes
* omap enablement
* optimization efforts for dove and freescale BSPs (out of archive)
* sound on dove investigation (good progress)
* qemu stability issues investigation - no news (Bug:532733)

==== Image Status ====
* imx51 and dove in good shape

** main blocker: aufs being broken (Bug:548924)
** amitk is working on the framebuffer driver thats not ready yet

Fix committed:
* Bug:417009: openoffice.org "all openoffice apps die in 'com::sun::star::ucb::InteractiveAugmentedIOException' on armel in karmic"

Triaged problems:
* Bug:514257: xine-lib "[arm] needs porting to thumb2"
* Bug:514254: upx-ucl "[arm] needs porting to thumb2"
* Bug:528524: pulseaudio "Sound not working in all apps on dove"

Bugs which need better understanding/debugging:
* Bug:532733: qemu-kvm "apt/dpkg in qemu-system-arm hangs if a big task is installed"
